text: قَالَ فَإِنَّهَا مُحَرَّمَةٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡۛ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗۛ يَتِيهُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ فَلَا تَأۡسَ عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
translation: 26.Yalli isi Nabii Muusak tama yahuudul tama magaalay taahirik tani morooton Sanatih gide tet culaanam keenil caraamuk tan, usun Baaxot baditih maxqawitak, toysa Muusaw Yallih amri cineeh kay taaqatak yewqe marah ma- rookitin kaak iyye.
